```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
    library("plotlyutils")
    library("ggplot2")
    library("plotly")
})

g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(class, hwy))
g <- g + geom_boxplot()
print(g)
ggplotly(g)
```

```{r}
# plot_ly(mpg, x = ~class, y = ~hwy, type = "box")
```

plotly_boxplot(iris[, -5])
